ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges

Class Badges

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges.Badges
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Badges
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Used to track and manage the completion of every badge. If every badge is earned, then the user will receive the Completionist badge.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team06
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Badges()

    • Method Detail

      • checkAllBadges

        public void checkAllBadges(java.lang.String s)
        Tests if every badge has been achieved. If a badge has not been achieved, tests if it has been achieved since last login
        Parameters:
        s - String to hold every boolean value of the status of the badges

      • getBadges

        public boolean[] getBadges()
        Returns a boolean array of every badge. Every index corresponds to a specific badge. If every index is true then the badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        allBadges boolean[] true if badge achieved Each location in array corresponds to a badge

      • getPercentages

        public double[] getPercentages()
        Returns the percent representaion of how much of every badge has been completed
        Returns:
        allPercentages double[] of all percentages until completion of every badges

      • getDescriptions

        public java.lang.String[] getDescriptions()
        Returns the description of every badge so the user knows what they must do in order to earn the badge.
        Returns:
        allDescriptions String[] of every badge description

      • storeBadges

        public static void storeBadges(Badges badges)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Stores the badge class to a Badges.dat file.
        Parameters:
        badges - the Badges object to be stored
        Throws:
        thrown - if the file cannot be written to or does not exist
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadBadges

        public static Badges loadBadges()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the badge class from a Badges.dat file.
        Throws:
        thrown - if the file cannot be read or does not exits
        java.lang.Exception
